amendment.description: To modify the requirements related to the Director and Deputy Director of the Central Intelligence Agency.

vote.text: Amendment SA 863 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 863 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843. (consideration: CR S4559-4560, S4560-4562; text: CR S4562) To modify the requirements related to the Director and Deputy Director of the Central Intelligence Agency.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 863 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 863 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843.
